meaningMnemonic: This <radical>leader</radical> has <radical>two</radical> things that remind him of his <kanji>humanity</kanji>: his shoes, and his hat. These two things remind the leader of his humanity because humans are the only ones who wear shoes and hats.
readingMnemonic: Another thing that reminds you and the leader about your <kanji>humanity</kanji> is wearing <reading>jean</reading>s (じん). Jeans are the go-to legwear for many people, and no one but humans wear them. Jeans are another great symbol of humanity.
